data.title: PETER PHILLIPS
data.meta_description: By Peter Phillips and Carlo Pignagnoli. Peter Phillips is one of the precursors of the Pop Art movement. His works feature current celebrities, advertising objects and representatives of American society. Idea E, 1977. Out Of Print. Condition:Good. Crushed bottom spine corner leading into the first 56 pages, also 2 bumped corners. Soiling and cover wear. No dustjacket.Â  The title is on the back of the book and upside down. Flipped. Printing error.
data.text:
Description

Peter Phillips work is one of the precursors of the Pop Art movement. His works feature current celebrities, advertising objects and representatives of American society.

Full-page photographs in black & white and some in full color, 154 plates including 7 double pages, unpaginated. Text is in in 2 columns.

Translated from French into English by Lydia Predominato Astengo.
